resources.string:
RemindDoor collects user personal information to provide users a personalised app experience. The personal information we collect and why we collect is detailed below:
  • Username – Allows authorised person(s) to unlock the door.
  • Begin-End Stay Times – Allows hosts to grant limited time door access for guest users.
  • Door Unlock PIN – Allows authorised person(s) to unlock the door via secure pin.
By ticking the checkbox below you are providing explicit consent to RemindDoor to collect this information in compliance with GDPR.
